channel.title: God of War III hangs :<
channel.description:
So I'm going through GoW3 and having a blast, no issues with the game whatsoever.
But then I reach the "Cavern's Hidden Passageway" (just after the labyrinth) and the music starts looping, but still playable... For a minute or so.. Then the game "pauses" and the spinning omega sign appears while the actual game is frozen.
There isn't a single scratch on the disk and I doubt it's the PS3 since it's pretty new and doesn't happen to any other game.
Anyone know what's the cause of this and if it can be fixed?
(PS3 isn't chipped and the game itself is the real deal)

item.title: God of War III hangs :<
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
I WANNA PLAY GOW3 BUT I HAVE NO PS3

;_;

Read full topic

item.title: God of War III hangs :<
item.dc:creator: Grigori
item.description:
Got newest system firmware? Game updated?

Read full topic

item.title: God of War III hangs :<
item.dc:creator: Trigger_Proximity
item.description:
Try renting out another copy of God of War 3 and trying it there. That should let you know if it’s a disc problem or a console problem. If it’s a console contact Sony support or whatever. If it’s a disc problem simply take it back and say it doesn’t work.

Read full topic
